Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>We seem to have reached an end point
for the Purah Pad's development.

What's next for me... Maybe I'll go
somewhere with Jerrin. Kick up our feet,
begin the next phase of our life together.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But not until everyone does what they can
to find Princess Zelda.

Your Purah Pad is fully equipped with all
you could need for exploration now.

I suggest you make use of its full range of
capabilities to complete your mission!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>In the meantime, I'll be here to provide
upkeep for the <clr:0000>Purah Pad<clr:ffff>.

If there's anything you don't understand
about the <clr:0000>new features<clr:ffff>, come bug me.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Your Purah Pad has everything you could
need for max exploration now.

Until you find Princess Zelda, I'll be here
to provide upkeep for the <clr:0000>Purah Pad<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If there's anything you don't understand
about the <clr:0000>new features<clr:ffff>, come bug me.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey. You! I told you—talk to me later. For
now you should hurry up and go to <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's a sensor that detects an indicated
target and alerts you with a nifty sound!

As you <clr:0000>approach your designated target<clr:ffff>,
the <clr:0000>sensor<clr:ffff>'s reaction will go wild.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can set a target from the <clr:0000>map <clr:ffff>or from
the <clr:0000>Hyrule Compendium<clr:ffff>.

It'll help you locate your target—whatever
that may be—AND it'll make your treasure
hunts far more efficient.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To top it off, it can even sense the
presence of chosen monsters so that
you can avoid battles if you like.<sp:5:1:0>
It's got a ton of functionality, so have fun
with it!
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a groundbreaking system that
displays the places you've traveled
on the <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>!
Just switch <clr:0000>hero's path mode<clr:ffff> to on,
and voilà! You'll be able to see where
you've been!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Pretty sure there was a time when Jerrin was going
to test it out on me, actually...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ha! ANYWAY.


Anything else you wanted to ask
me about?
Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, yes! Travel instantly to a location
where you've set up a <clr:0000>travel medallion<clr:ffff>!

It's a simple yet ingenious invention!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>I put them in your Key Items, so be sure
to look there whenever you want to create
a travel gate.
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Now then.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Have you been making good progress on
your <clr:0000>Hyrule Compendium<clr:ffff>?

If you're having trouble, you can copy
<clr:0000>pictures<clr:ffff> from mine.

Go ahead and pick out what you want
from the <clr:0000>compendium on the desk<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ask me anything about the Purah Pad's
new features. I'll talk your ear off!
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey! You! How are you? And how's the
Purah Pad?

It's got everything you could need for max
exploration now.

I suggest you make use of its full range of
capabilities to complete your mission!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>In the meantime, I'll be here to provide
upkeep for the <clr:0000>Purah Pad<clr:ffff>.

If there's anything you don't understand
about the <clr:0000>new features<clr:ffff>, come bug me.
Talk_79:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You know, that Purah Pad of yours can
get a lot more powerful.

I know its real potential.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've got big plans for that device, but
first I need to help Josha with her
<clr:0000>investigations into the<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Depths<clr:ffff>.
But then—oh, yes, THEN!—I will head
back to the <clr:0000>lab in Hateno Village<clr:ffff> to
resume my research.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So, once I'm able to finish up here,
you should join me there!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Don't answer that. Tell me later. For now,
you should hurry and go talk to <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>She's been in a tizzy ever since you and
the princess disappeared.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> Nope, now's not the time for
distractions!<sp:5:0:0> That's got to wait until later.

Anyway, I hear you've got yourself the
<clr:0000>Purah Pad <clr:ffff>now.
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Hey! Hey, you! Do you have any idea how
worried we've been?!
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, you! Do you have any idea how
worried we've been?!
Talk_2015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, you! Can you show me your
Hyrule Compendium for a second?
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>She's in the building with the telescope,
up on the <clr:0000>second floor<clr:ffff>. Go see her and
give her some peace of mind, will ya?
Talk_80:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So that's the arm, huh? I...overheard
Purah talking about it. Hmmm. I...see.
Yeah, it's pretty weird, all right.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Didn't I explain this feature to
you already?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, that's fine. When it comes to the
Purah Pad, I'll explain as many times as
it takes!
Talk_2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What's all this? You've completely filled
out your compendium, have you?
It's...beautiful!
You've really outdone yourself. I've got a
little special something for you.
Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey. Hey, YOU! Where have you been?!
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00>WAIT A MINUTE!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


What do you think you're doing?!
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You wanna hear about that feature again?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Oho, smitten with my inventions, are you?
I certainly can't blame you. I'll explain as
many times as you like.
Talk_2017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Bam! Now you can use the Purah Pad's
other features to help you in
your adventures!
Talk_82:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Josha needs that for her <clr:0000>chasm research<clr:ffff>!
Don't touch any of it without her
permission.
I'll get in big trouble if you do.
Talk_2018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, you! Your compendium is already
perfect, isn't it?

If there's anything else you need, come
bug me any ol' time.
Talk_2019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you have any more questions, come
bug me.
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey, you! That balloon is slated for
research purposes. So don't you dare
touch it. It's off-limits!
